components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Movicel in Angola

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Movicel in Angola. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Ooredoo Network In Tunisia

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo network in Tunisia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo network in Tunisia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo network in Tunisia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified an issue with Twilio console and paid support plans and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Billing

incident_updates.body: We have discovered an issue with Twilio console and paid support plans. Our engineers are investigating this issue. We will give an update in 24 hours or when more information is available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Win Mobile, Volna mobile and Personnal Communicational

incident_updates.body: The Win Mobile, Volna mobile and Personnal Communicational networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 09 October 2025 at 13:33 PDT until 09 October 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Win Mobile, Volna mobile and Personnal Communicational Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 13 October 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 15 October 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to AT&T United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

13 October 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 14 October 2025 at 04:00 PDT
14 October 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 15 October 2025 at 04:00 PDT
